content: this is a knitting pattern not a finished product you will receive a pdf file with step-by-step instructions on how to make the tiny hearts/fair isle beanie available as an instant download sizes newborn-adult skill level beginner the pattern uses standard american terms yarn lion brand wool-ease thick & quick - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - please note that all of these patterns can be found for free with ads on my blog here http //www cjdesignblog com/ - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - returns/refunds there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - i would love to see your finished products tag me on instagram @cj dsgn and use the hashtag #fairislebeanie resell finished product with pattern credit © 2021 cj design all rights reserved
